body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Ocean View Hotels. My name is Noah Russell. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Rachel. To assist you better, may I have your date of birth in the format of day, month, year? For example, if your birthday is on the 15th of July, 1985, it would be one five zero seven one nine eight five.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my date of birth is three zero one zero one nine eight eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Additionally, may I have the last four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, the last four digits are seven five zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing your information, Rachel. Is there anything specific you would like to discuss today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling excited about my upcoming stay at Ocean View Hotels but had a question about the food quality.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for letting us know, Rachel. We appreciate your feedback and will address that concern. If you have any more questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out. Thank you for your time today!
